text: Gottfried John (;Unlike the common English name John, the German pronunciation begins with a "y" sound. August 29, 1942 â€“ September 1, 2014) was a German actor and comedian. John was known for his roles in General Ourumov in the James Bond movie GoldenEye and Julius Caesar in Asterix and Obelix take on Caesar. On September 1, 2014, John died in Utting am Ammersee near Munich, Germany of cancer at age 72. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Actors from Berlin Category:Actors who played in James Bond movies Category:Cancer deaths in Germany Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors
title: Gottfried John
